quotes.quote: Bad news travels fast. Good news takes the scenic route.
News travels fast in places where nothing much ever happens.
News is how the government delivers propaganda to the masses and it is an essential requirement of the television broadcasting job to be emotionless to this.
News, if unreported, has no impact. It might as well have not happened at all.
The bad news is that only the bad people reach the news because they are noisier.
News is what someone wants suppressed. Everything else is advertising.
News used to come too late; now it comes too early.
The news and the truth are not the same thing.
News is what somebody somewhere wants to suppress; all the rest is advertising.
News reporters are certainly liberal and left of center.
News is not a game show. You don't win a car if you happen to be right.
News is only the first rough draft of history.
All the papers that matter live off their advertisements, and the advertisers exercise an indirect censorship over news.
News events are like Texas weather. If you don't like it, wait a minute.
Bad news isn't wine. It doesn't improve with age.
Fake news is a big thing in the field of Social Media Journalism. Fake news can be as simple has spreading misinformation.or as dangerous as smearing hateful propaganda.
News events cannot be controlled, nor can newscasts be mapped out like entertainment shows.
We cannot make good news out of bad practice.
Bad news travels at the speed of light; good news travels like molasses.
News Coverage!! As news expose rather than cover events.
Today's news, which may be yesterday's anyway, will be eclipsed tomorrow.
News isn't designed to talk about daily life in its nuances, but poetry is.
News represents another form of advertising, not liberal propaganda.
News is something somebody doesn't want printed; all else is advertising.
The news did not trouble her particularly; all news was bad, like wage demands, strikes, or war, and the wise person paid no attention to it.
The news isn't there to tell you what happened. It's there to tell you what it wants you to hear or what it thinks you want to hear.
There is no better news, than the fact that Jesus can actually turn a life upside down and save it.
News, news, news - that is what we want. You cannot beat news in a newspaper.
But news right now is like a flock of speeded-up sheep running off the side of a cliff.
News is history shot on the wing.
